channel.title: Nodes on Houdini Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Nodes on Houdini Wiki

item.title: CHOP
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/chop Channel nodes create, filter, and manipulate channel data.

item.title: COP2
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/cop2 Composite nodes create, filter, and manipulate image data.

item.title: DOP
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/dop Dynamics nodes set up the conditions and rules for dynamics simulations.

item.title: LOP
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/lop LOP nodes generate USD describing characters, props, lighting, and rendering.

item.title: OBJ
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/obj Object nodes represent objects in the scene, such as character parts, geometry objects, lights, cameras, and so on.

item.title: ROP
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/out Render nodes either render the scene or set up render dependency networks.

item.title: SOP
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/sop Geometry nodes live inside Geo objects and generate geometry.

item.title: TOP
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/top TOP nodes define a workflow where data is fed into the network, turned into

item.title: VOP
item.author: zzossig@gmail.com (zzossig)
item.description: https://www.sidefx.com/docs/houdini/nodes/vop VOP nodes let you define a program (such as a shader) by connecting nodes together. Houdini then compiles the node network into executable VEX code.
